### Possible Planting Formations {#planting}
The Kebia berry can be mutated by equipping the [[File:Rocky_Helmet.png\|32px]][[Oak Items/Rocky Helmet]] while there is a [[Berries/Pamtre]] berry at Taller stage or later in the [[Farm]]. The Pamtre berry will then mutate into a Kebia berry.

**Base Formation**

::: table-mutations
| :----: |
[[File:Pamtre.png\|32px]] [[Berries/Pamtre]] {.mutation}| |
:::

**Optimized Formation**

:::collapsed Kebia Mutation - Farm Simulator Code
Copy & paste the line below into the [[Farm Simulator]]'s Import from Text.


:::
::: table-mutations
| :----: | :----: | :----: | :----: | :----: |
[[File:Pamtre.png\|32px]] [[Berries/Pamtre]] {.mutation} | [[File:Pamtre.png\|32px]] [[Berries/Pamtre]] {.mutation} | [[File:Pamtre.png\|32px]] [[Berries/Pamtre]] {.mutation} | [[File:Pamtre.png\|32px]] [[Berries/Pamtre]] {.mutation} | [[File:Pamtre.png\|32px]] [[Berries/Pamtre]] {.mutation} | |
[[File:Pamtre.png\|32px]] [[Berries/Pamtre]] {.mutation} | [[File:Pamtre.png\|32px]] [[Berries/Pamtre]] {.mutation} | [[File:Pamtre.png\|32px]] [[Berries/Pamtre]] {.mutation} | [[File:Pamtre.png\|32px]] [[Berries/Pamtre]] {.mutation} | [[File:Pamtre.png\|32px]] [[Berries/Pamtre]] {.mutation} | |
[[File:Pamtre.png\|32px]] [[Berries/Pamtre]] {.mutation} | [[File:Pamtre.png\|32px]] [[Berries/Pamtre]] {.mutation} | [[File:Pamtre.png\|32px]] [[Berries/Pamtre]] {.mutation} | [[File:Pamtre.png\|32px]] [[Berries/Pamtre]] {.mutation} | [[File:Pamtre.png\|32px]] [[Berries/Pamtre]] {.mutation} | |

[[File:Pamtre.png\|32px]] [[Berries/Pamtre]] {.mutation} | [[File:Pamtre.png\|32px]] [[Berries/Pamtre]] {.mutation} | [[File:Pamtre.png\|32px]] [[Berries/Pamtre]] {.mutation} | [[File:Pamtre.png\|32px]] [[Berries/Pamtre]] {.mutation} | [[File:Pamtre.png\|32px]] [[Berries/Pamtre]] {.mutation} | |

### Acquisition

If the "No Oak Items" [challenge](#!Challenge_Modes) is on, the Kebia berry can be bought from the [Johto Berry Master](#!Berry_Masters) for 10,000 Farm Points after unlocking [[Berries/Pamtre]].

#### Mutations
Kebia Berries can be used to mutate the following Berries.


| Used In                                       | Other Requirements |
| :---:                                         | :---: |
| [[File:Petaya.png\|32px]] [[Berries/Petaya]]  | [[File:Occa.png\|32px]] [[Berries/Occa]] [[File:Passho.png\|32px]] [[Berries/Passho]] [[File:Wacan.png\|32px]] [[Berries/Wacan]] [[File:Rindo.png\|32px]] [[Berries/Rindo]] [[File:Yache.png\|32px]] [[Berries/Yache]] [[File:Chople.png\|32px]] [[Berries/Chople]] [[File:Shuca.png\|32px]] [[Berries/Shuca]] [[File:Coba.png\|32px]] [[Berries/Coba]] [[File:Payapa.png\|32px]] [[Berries/Payapa]] [[File:Tanga.png\|32px]] [[Berries/Tanga]] [[File:Charti.png\|32px]] [[Berries/Charti]] [[File:Kasib.png\|32px]] [[Berries/Kasib]] [[File:Haban.png\|32px]] [[Berries/Haban]] [[File:Colbur.png\|32px]] [[Berries/Colbur]] [[File:Babiri.png\|32px]] [[Berries/Babiri]] [[File:Chilan.png\|32px]] [[Berries/Chilan]] [[File:Roseli.png\|32px]] [[Berries/Roseli]] |
